name: Staccato
description:
Greenlight page

Staccato is a rhythm game in which you slay different monsters instead of hitting abstract squares. Each monster represents a note, most loud notes appear as bosses.

You can select any song on your computer and instantly play it. It will be analyzed automatically, no need for any editors. Difficulty slider will affect amount of enemies and their speed.

Many different themes: forest with skeletons, cemetery with ghosts, desert, sewers, etc. Different themes can have completely different graphics style.

Controls:
1, 2, 3 - attack left middle and right lane.
Space - attack boss.

Current version is completely playable.
